FuncDef: This command inserts bit errors into a running BERT test. The number of errors inserted corresponds to 10^(-rate). A rate of 0 will cause 1 error in every bit transmitted. A rate of 7 will cause an error rate of 10^(-7), or 1 error in every one billion bits transmitted.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the bit error rate, expressed as an integer. Values-2 to 7.
